channel.title: Mobile phone number suspended after every user assigned to it dies
channel.description:
Spooked phone bosses have suspended the mobile phone number 0888 888 888 - after every single person assigned to it died in the last 10 years.
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/worldnews/article-1281327/Jinxed-phone-number-0888-888-888-suspended-EVERY-user-dies.html oh what would we do without you, daily mail

item.title: Mobile phone number suspended after every user assigned to it dies
item.dc:creator: @Scrubs Scrubs
item.description:
@Scrubs wrote:

He died after £130million of the drug was intercepted by police on its way into the country from Colombia.
anyone else find this weird?

item.title: Mobile phone number suspended after every user assigned to it dies
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Spooked phone bosses have suspended the mobile phone number 0888 888 888 - after every single person assigned to it died in the last 10 years.
Mail Online – 25 May 10

Mobile phone number 0888 888 888 suspended after every user assigned to it DIES

Vladimir Grashnov died of cancer in 2001. Konstantin Dimitrov was assassinated in 2003. And Konstantin Dishliev was gunned down outside an Indian restaurant in 2005.

oh what would we do without you, daily mail
